  "title": "Senior DevSecOps and Infrastructure Expert Job at Vennote Technologies Limited",
  "description": "Vennote Technologies Limited is a well-established ICT company with experience spanning over two decades in enterprise solutions using best of breed products in very large IT deployments around the world. Vennote Technologies Limited has certified Skilled Technical resources delivering world class implementation and support services through the use of best practices.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Senior DevSecOps and Infrastructure Expert

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos, Nigeria

Job Description


	Are you an experienced DevSecOps and IT Infrastructure expert with strong technical skills, and the ability to innovate, multi-task, and work in an agile environment? Then, join our team in Lagos Nigeria in revolutionizing customer service with our cutting-edge AI-powered chatbot.
	Vennote Technologies is building a next-generation Natural Language Understanding, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence product with a focus on Retrieval-Augmented Generation, Multimodal and Cross-Channel User Interfaces (phone, web, mobile, etc.)
	This is a full-time Hybrid position and successful candidates will play a critical role in designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and security posture of our AI-powered chatbot platform.
	You will be responsible for ensuring its stability, performance, and security while supporting our development teams and driving continuous improvement.
	It is also a senior technical leadership position and requires individuals who enjoy challenges, prioritize, meet deadlines, and have a collaborative work ethic and teamwork spirit leading our team of Software developers, NLP Engineers, data Scientists, Speech Scientists, Analysts, and Project Managers.


We have:


	A state-of-the-art, highly innovative Product platform that we continuously expand/improve to maintain our leadership
	A team of seasoned experts to collaborate with.
	An open mind to new technologies, methodologies, challenges, and innovation


Responsibilities


	Infrastructure Management: Design, build, and maintain our cloud-based infrastructure on Azure. Optimize for performance, scalability, and cost-effectiveness. This includes managing servers, databases, networking components, and CI/CD pipelines.
	CI/CD Pipeline Management: Design, build, and maintain robust and automated CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and continuous delivery of our chatbot platform.
	DevSecOps Practices: Champion and implement DevSecOps principles, automating security checks and integrating security into the development and deployment pipelines.
	Security Implementation: Implement and manage security best practices across the entire infrastructure and application lifecycle. This includes vulnerability scanning, penetration testing, security audits, intrusion detection/prevention, and access control.
	Monitoring and Logging: Implement comprehensive monitoring and logging solutions to proactively identify and address performance bottlenecks, security incidents, and system issues.
	Incident Response: Participate in incident response activities, including troubleshooting, root cause analysis, and implementing corrective actions.
	Collaboration: Work closely with development, security, and operations teams to ensure seamless integration and collaboration.
	Automation: Automate repetitive tasks and processes to improve efficiency and reduce manual effort.
	Documentation: Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation of infrastructure, security procedures, and deployment processes.
	Staying Current: Stay up to date with the latest security threats, vulnerabilities, and best practices.
	Knowledge of Azure Cloud, Azure Cosmos DB, Databases and Kubernetes.
	Document and monitor requirements needed to institute proposed updates
	Account for possible project challenges on constraints including, risks, time, resources and scope
	Work closely with project management teams to successfully monitor progress of initiatives and deliveries
	Provide Solution document, technical document and detailed specifications for proposed solutions.
	Have an agile product mentality balancing between finding solutions that deliver high precision/recall, over simpler approaches that can give value to customers in shorter intervals.
	Demonstrate passion, excitement, and real interest in what we do while being respectful of others and fun to work with
	Get involved in all stagaes of ML lifecycle


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in cComputer Science or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
	10 years of plus experience as an Infrastructure expert and DevSecOps engineer
	Proven experience in DevSecOps and infrastructure management, preferably in a cloud-native environment.
	Strong understanding of Azure cloud computing platforms.
	Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
	Expertise in CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI).
	Solid understanding of security best practices and frameworks (e.g., OWASP, NIST).
	Experience with security tools and technologies (e.g., vulnerability scanners, penetration testing tools, SIEM).
	Strong scripting and automation skills (e.g., Python, Bash).
	Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
	Strong communication and collaboration skills.
	Experience with AI/ML platforms and related infrastructure is a plus.
	Experience with chatbot technologies is a plus.


We Offer


	An attractive remuneration package
	Comprehensive health Insurance plan
	Continuous learning/training in new technologies and products
	A great environment to work in, excel and progress professionally


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;dave.nwokedi@vennote.com&nbsp;referencing the Job Position title as the subject of the email.

Note&nbsp;


	All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.
	Only suitable candidates will be contacted.

Senior DevSecOps and Infrastructure Expert Job at Vennote Technologies Limited




        
    

        
        Vennote Technologies Limited is a well-established ICT company with experience spanning over two decades in enterprise solutions using best of breed products in very large IT deployments around the world. Vennote Technologies Limited has certified Skilled Technical resources delivering world class implementation and support services through the use of best practices.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior DevSecOps and Infrastructure Expert

Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria

Job Description
     

            
    




	Are you an experienced DevSecOps and IT Infrastructure expert with strong technical skills, and the ability to innovate, multi-task, and work in an agile environment? Then, join our team in Lagos Nigeria in revolutionizing customer service with our cutting-edge AI-powered chatbot.
	Vennote Technologies is building a next-generation Natural Language Understanding, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence product with a focus on Retrieval-Augmented Generation, Multimodal and Cross-Channel User Interfaces (phone, web, mobile, etc.)
	This is a full-time Hybrid position and successful candidates will play a critical role in designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and security posture of our AI-powered chatbot platform.
	You will be responsible for ensuring its stability, performance, and security while supporting our development teams and driving continuous improvement.
	It is also a senior technical leadership position and requires individuals who enjoy challenges, prioritize, meet deadlines, and have a collaborative work ethic and teamwork spirit leading our team of Software developers, NLP Engineers, data Scientists, Speech Scientists, Analysts, and Project Managers.


We have:


	A state-of-the-art, highly innovative Product platform that we continuously expand/improve to maintain our leadership
	A team of seasoned experts to collaborate with.
	An open mind to new technologies, methodologies, challenges, and innovation


Responsibilities


	Infrastructure Management: Design, build, and maintain our cloud-based infrastructure on Azure. Optimize for performance, scalability, and cost-effectiveness. This includes managing servers, databases, networking components, and CI/CD pipelines.
	CI/CD Pipeline Management: Design, build, and maintain robust and automated CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and continuous delivery of our chatbot platform.
	DevSecOps Practices: Champion and implement DevSecOps principles, automating security checks and integrating security into the development and deployment pipelines.
	Security Implementation: Implement and manage security best practices across the entire infrastructure and application lifecycle. This includes vulnerability scanning, penetration testing, security audits, intrusion detection/prevention, and access control.
	Monitoring and Logging: Implement comprehensive monitoring and logging solutions to proactively identify and address performance bottlenecks, security incidents, and system issues.
	Incident Response: Participate in incident response activities, including troubleshooting, root cause analysis, and implementing corrective actions.
	Collaboration: Work closely with development, security, and operations teams to ensure seamless integration and collaboration.
	Automation: Automate repetitive tasks and processes to improve efficiency and reduce manual effort.
	Documentation: Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation of infrastructure, security procedures, and deployment processes.
	Staying Current: Stay up to date with the latest security threats, vulnerabilities, and best practices.
	Knowledge of Azure Cloud, Azure Cosmos DB, Databases and Kubernetes.
	Document and monitor requirements needed to institute proposed updates
	Account for possible project challenges on constraints including, risks, time, resources and scope
	Work closely with project management teams to successfully monitor progress of initiatives and deliveries
	Provide Solution document, technical document and detailed specifications for proposed solutions.
	Have an agile product mentality balancing between finding solutions that deliver high precision/recall, over simpler approaches that can give value to customers in shorter intervals.
	Demonstrate passion, excitement, and real interest in what we do while being respectful of others and fun to work with
	Get involved in all stagaes of ML lifecycle


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in cComputer Science or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
	10 years of plus experience as an Infrastructure expert and DevSecOps engineer
	Proven experience in DevSecOps and infrastructure management, preferably in a cloud-native environment.
	Strong understanding of Azure cloud computing platforms.
	Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
	Expertise in CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI).
	Solid understanding of security best practices and frameworks (e.g., OWASP, NIST).
	Experience with security tools and technologies (e.g., vulnerability scanners, penetration testing tools, SIEM).
	Strong scripting and automation skills (e.g., Python, Bash).
	Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
	Strong communication and collaboration skills.
	Experience with AI/ML platforms and related infrastructure is a plus.
	Experience with chatbot technologies is a plus.


We Offer


	An attractive remuneration package
	Comprehensive health Insurance plan
	Continuous learning/training in new technologies and products
	A great environment to work in, excel and progress professionally


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: dave.nwokedi@vennote.com referencing the Job Position title as the subject of the email.

Note 


	All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.
	Only suitable candidates will be contacted.

Inventory Officer Job at Moniepoint




        
    

        
        Moniepoint Incorporated is a global business payments and banking platform and recently became QED Investors’ first investment in Africa. We are the partner of choice for over 600,000 businesses of all sizes, powering the dreams of SMBs and providing them with equal access to the tools they need to grow and scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory Officer
Job Location: Lagos

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Inventory Support Officer is responsible for providing operational and administrative support in the management of inventory and ensuring accurate recording and tracking of stock levels.
	They will assist in maintaining efficient inventory control processes, conducting regular audits, reconciling discrepancies, and facilitating the smooth flow of inventory operations.


Job Description


	Inventory Management: Monitor and manage inventory levels for hardware devices, ensuring stock accuracy and availability.
	Device Allocation: Ensure timely distribution and allocation of hardware devices to all stakeholders. Reporting: Generate and analyze inventory reports to track stock levels, Data Accuracy: Ensure that all inventory transactions are accurately recorded, and resolve any data inconsistencies.
	Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement in inventory management, including streamlining procedures, enhancing data accuracy, and implementing best practices.
	Communication: Communicate effectively with internal stakeholders regarding inventory status, stock availability, and any inventory-related concerns. Compliance: Ensure adherence to company policies, procedures, and industry regulations related to inventory management.
	Perform other duties as delegated and assigned by his/her Line Manager


Requirements


	OND / HND, Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Business Administration, or a related field is preferred.
	Similar experience in inventory management or related roles.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to reconcile discrepancies and identify areas for improvement.
	Proficiency in using inventory management software and Microsoft Office applications.
	Excellent attention to detail and accuracy in data entry and record-keeping.
	Strong organizational and time management skills to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
	Effective written and verbal communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
	Knowledge of inventory control principles, stock management techniques, and inventory valuation methods.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a proactive and solution-oriented approach.

  "description": "Advans Nigeria is an international microfinance bank with a national license from the Central Bank of Nigeria. The bank was incorporated in Nigeria in February 2013.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Product Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo

Product Development:


	Lead the development of new products from ideation through market launch.
	Collaborate with engineering, design, and marketing teams to define product specifications and requirements.
	Establish product development roadmaps and timelines.
	Ensure products meet quality standards and alignment with company strategic goals.
	Identify opportunities for product enhancements and innovations.

	Own the product lifecycle management process.
	Create and maintain product documentation including PRDs (Product Requirement Documents).
	Coordinate cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on product direction.
	Establish pricing strategies in collaboration with sales and finance teams.
	Manage product budgets and resource allocation.


Product Performance Management / Evaluation:


	Establish KPIs and metrics to evaluate product performance.
	Analyze product performance data to identify trends and opportunities.
	Conduct regular product reviews to assess market fit and competitive positioning.
	Identify underperforming products and develop improvement strategies.
	Report on product performance to senior management.

	Lead product-related projects from initiation to completion.
	Create and maintain project plans, timelines, and resource requirements.
	Coordinate with stakeholders to ensure project deliverables meet objectives.
	Identify and mitigate project risks and issues.
	Ensure projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.

	Conduct market research to identify customer needs and pain points.
	Use both qualitative and quantitative research methods to understand customer requirements.
	Organize and analyze customer feedback for product improvements.
	Create user personas and journey maps to guide product development.
	Translate customer insights into actionable product features.


Competitor Knowledge and Evaluation:


	Monitor competitor activities, product offerings, and market strategies.
	Conduct regular competitive analysis to identify market gaps and opportunities.
	Benchmark company products against competitors.
	Stay informed about industry trends and emerging technologies.
	Develop strategies to maintain competitive advantage.

	Develop comprehensive customer profiles for target market segments.
	Identify key customer segments for product positioning.
	Create and maintain buyer personas to inform product decisions.
	Analyze customer behavior patterns and preferences.
	Collaborate with marketing to ensure messaging reaches the right audience.


Reporting:


	Create regular reports on product performance, market conditions, and competitive landscape.
	Develop executive summaries and presentations for leadership.
	Track and report on key metrics related to product success.
	Generate insights from data to inform strategic decisions.
	Communicate product status and progress to stakeholders.


Product Sales Optimization:


	Work with sales teams to develop effective selling strategies.
	Create sales enablement materials and product training.
	Identify opportunities to increase product adoption and usage.
	Analyze sales data to optimize product positioning and pricing.
	Collaborate with marketing on campaigns to drive product sales.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.

Digital Product Officer Job at Advans Nigeria




        
    

        
        Advans Nigeria is an international microfinance bank with a national license from the Central Bank of Nigeria. We offer great flexibility, independence, and financial security to help our clients stay committed to their short and long-term financial goals. The bank was incorporated in Nigeria in February 2013.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Product Officer
Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo

Responsibilities
Product Development:
     

            
    




	Lead the development of new products from ideation through market launch.
	Collaborate with engineering, design, and marketing teams to define product specifications and requirements.
	Establish product development roadmaps and timelines.
	Ensure products meet quality standards and alignment with company strategic goals.
	Identify opportunities for product enhancements and innovations.


Product Management:


	Own the product lifecycle management process.
	Create and maintain product documentation including PRDs (Product Requirement Documents).
	Coordinate cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on product direction.
	Establish pricing strategies in collaboration with sales and finance teams.
	Manage product budgets and resource allocation.


Product Performance Management / Evaluation:


	Establish KPIs and metrics to evaluate product performance.
	Analyze product performance data to identify trends and opportunities.
	Conduct regular product reviews to assess market fit and competitive positioning.
	Identify underperforming products and develop improvement strategies.
	Report on product performance to senior management.


Project Management:


	Lead product-related projects from initiation to completion.
	Create and maintain project plans, timelines, and resource requirements.
	Coordinate with stakeholders to ensure project deliverables meet objectives.
	Identify and mitigate project risks and issues.
	Ensure projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.


Customer Need Analysis:


	Conduct market research to identify customer needs and pain points.
	Use both qualitative and quantitative research methods to understand customer requirements.
	Organize and analyze customer feedback for product improvements.
	Create user personas and journey maps to guide product development.
	Translate customer insights into actionable product features.


Competitor Knowledge and Evaluation:


	Monitor competitor activities, product offerings, and market strategies.
	Conduct regular competitive analysis to identify market gaps and opportunities.
	Benchmark company products against competitors.
	Stay informed about industry trends and emerging technologies.
	Develop strategies to maintain competitive advantage.


Customer Profiling:


	Develop comprehensive customer profiles for target market segments.
	Identify key customer segments for product positioning.
	Create and maintain buyer personas to inform product decisions.
	Analyze customer behavior patterns and preferences.
	Collaborate with marketing to ensure messaging reaches the right audience.


Reporting:


	Create regular reports on product performance, market conditions, and competitive landscape.
	Develop executive summaries and presentations for leadership.
	Track and report on key metrics related to product success.
	Generate insights from data to inform strategic decisions.
	Communicate product status and progress to stakeholders.


Product Sales Optimization:


	Work with sales teams to develop effective selling strategies.
	Create sales enablement materials and product training.
	Identify opportunities to increase product adoption and usage.
	Analyze sales data to optimize product positioning and pricing.
	Collaborate with marketing on campaigns to drive product sales.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Head, Investment Job at Coronation",
  "description": "Coronation is a leading financial service partner that helps build enduring legacies for sustainable wealth creation in Africa. Having established a 30-year record of achievements in banking across Africa and beyond, our founders established a Pan-African platform focused on building a better financial future for Africa. Today, our businesses are entrusted with our over $1billion of clients&rsquo; assets and are recognized as Nigeria&#39;s fastest-growing investment managers. Our purpose at Coronation is to create a prosperous future for our clients and the African continent. Coronation is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We enable an inclusive workplace by identity, disability, and other statuses protected by law.

Coronation Insurance Plc&ndash; an affiliated company to Coronation Group Ltd - is a leading insurance provider of a diverse range of products and services covering general and special risk businesses to individuals and corporate entities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head, Investment
